text: hi all; I haven't used JuliaDB in quite a while and I don't see much activity around it. what is the state of the project? I am thinking of using it in conjunction with OnlineStats and Flux, but I noticed when I ]add JuliaDB, my Flux gets downgraded to v0.8.3, along with a number of other packages

text: It hasn't been actively maintained for a while.  It's a shame because it has some really great ideas in it/features I prefer over DataFrames.

elements.text: It hasn't been actively maintained for a while.  It's a shame because it has some really great ideas in it/features I prefer over DataFrames.

text: If you are interested in the out-of-core stuff, I'd look at <https://github.com/shashi/FileTrees.jl>

text: It would be nice if someone would merge the CompatHelper PRs... we do still use JuliaDB, and it seems like just someone on the JuliaData team taking care of that would be very helpful...
